name: Boots
description: Standard boots. Great for jumping on basic enemies.

name: Iron Boots
description: Stronger than regular boots - and they can stomp spiked enemies!

name: Shiny Boots
description: Stronger than Iron Boots, but can't stomp spiked enemies.

name: Gold Boots
description: Wear these to stomp a few coins out of your enemies!

name: Shiny Iron Boots
description: Stronger and shinier than your regular Iron Boots.

name: Flashy Boots
description: Stronger than Shiny Boots, but can't stomp spiked enemies.

name: Flashy Iron Boots
description: Stronger and fancier than regular Iron Boots. They can deal huge damage!

name: Legendary Boots
description: The strongest boots of all. Still cannot stomp spiked enemies.

name: Legendary Iron Boots
description: The strongest type of Iron Boots. Crush your spiked foes!
